mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_BOARD_STAR.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD_STAR (STAR, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE, MEM_NO, BOARD_NO) VALUES (#{star}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{memNo}, #{boardNo})
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS boardNo, B.MEM_NO AS memNo, M.NICKNAME AS nickname, B.BOARD_CONTENT AS boardContent, TO_CHAR(B.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS createdDate, TO_CHAR(B.UPDATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS updatedDate, NVL(( SELECT S.STAR FROM BOARD_STAR S WHERE S.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND S.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), NULL) AS star FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT FILE_NO AS fileNo, BOARD_NO AS boardNo, TYPE_NO AS typeNo, FILE_NAME AS fileName, FILE_PATH AS filePath, FILE_SIZE AS fileSize, FILE_TYPE AS fileType, TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS uploadDate FROM BOARD_IMAGE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY FILE_NO
